awd_titl_txt: Link Westminster College of Salt Lake City to NSFNet
awd_abstract_narration: Westminster College requests support from NSF for connection               of its campus network to WESTnet.  Westnet is the midlevel                      network located in the state of Utah which will provide                         operations management and information services and it will give                 Westminster College a 56 thousand bits per second connection to                 the NSFNET, a high speed (1.5 - 45 million bits per second)                     National Backbone network.                                                           The College needs greater functionality and network speed to               be able to access supercomputers, libraries, and make file                      transfers along with being able to implement a more reliable mail               system. Students and faculty research will benefit from the link.               This is also a unique opportunity for the school to explore                     innovative educational resources.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
